channel.title: Select Sorts :: Data Structures in C#
channel.description: Select Sorts A select sort operates by repeatedly selecting the smallest data element of an unsorted portion of the array and moving it to the end of a sorted portion. Thus, at each step, the data items will be arranged into two parts: A sorted part; and An unsorted part in which each element is at least as large as all elements in the sorted part. The following figure illustrates this arrangement.
